sourcesContent:
Add Product

{{message}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../../models/Product'; import { Purchase } from '../../models/Purchase'; import { Sale } from '../../models/Sale'; import { ProductService } from '../../services/product/product.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-product', templateUrl: './add-product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-product.component.css'] }) export class AddProductComponent { model: Product; message: string; errorMessage: string; constructor(private productService: ProductService) { this.model = { name: '', description: '', quantity: 0, price: 0, productId: 0, purchases: [], sales: [] }; this.message = 'test'; this.errorMessage = ''; } onFormSubmit() { console.log(this.model) this.productService.addProduct(this.model).subscribe({ next: (response) => { console.log('product added ', response); this.message = 'Product Added successfully'; }, error: (error) => { console.error('error when adding product', error); this.errorMessage = 'Error when addinProduct'; } }) } }
